results.title: Berserker
results.summary: You turn pressure into momentum and break stalemates by force.
results.lore: The Berserker enters the fray where lines buckle and fear hardens. Their will is not calm, but volcanic. They carry victories that others call impossible and scars they rarely name.
signals: Prefers decisive action over prolonged planning.
Performs best when stakes are high and immediate.
Uses instinct and pressure to overwhelm opponents.
results.growthQuest: Learn when to hold power in reserve.

results.title: Guardian
results.summary: You protect first, absorb chaos, and create safe ground for others.
results.lore: Guardians are the unbroken wall in moments of collapse. Their strength is measured by who makes it home. They hold the line even when no song will celebrate it.
signals: Keeps composure while others panic.
Prioritizes team survival over personal glory.
Builds trust through consistency and sacrifice.
results.growthQuest: Delegate trust instead of absorbing every burden.

results.title: Warlord
results.summary: You unify force and structure, turning chaotic fights into directed victories.
results.lore: Warlords shape the battlefield before steel meets steel. Their commands are sharp, practical, and costly when ignored. They are remembered for campaigns, not duels.
signals: Balances offense with battlefield discipline.
Reads tempo and shifts formations quickly.
Leads from the front without losing command focus.

results.title: Blade Dancer
results.summary: You win by rhythm, spacing, and exact movement under pressure.
results.lore: Blade Dancers learn to hear openings before they appear. Their style is equal parts grace and danger, each step cutting a path between risk and art.
signals: Relies on timing over brute force.
Thrives in dynamic, fast-changing engagements.
Finds elegant solutions in tight spaces.
results.growthQuest: Add resilience to match your speed.

results.title: Ranger
results.summary: You track, adapt, and strike from positions others fail to notice.
results.lore: Rangers read land, weather, and silence as if they were maps. They avoid wasted motion and leave no camp vulnerable. Their victories often go unseen until dawn.
signals: Combines awareness with patient execution.
Excels at pursuit, scouting, and ambush control.
Protects others through preparation.
results.growthQuest: Share your field reads earlier with the team.

results.title: Spellblade
results.summary: You fuse bladecraft and sorcery into one continuous combat language.
results.lore: Spellblades do not switch between sword and spell; they weave both in a single breath. They are scholars of pressure, distance, and channeling discipline under fire.
signals: Maintains offense while managing magical focus.
Prefers versatile loadouts over specialization.
Turns hybrid tools into tactical advantages.
results.growthQuest: Master economy so your peak lasts longer.

results.title: Archmage
results.summary: You bend complex systems and win through superior arcane mastery.
results.lore: Archmages are patient architects of impossible outcomes. They prepare layers of intent, then trigger them with absolute timing. Their power is less explosive than inevitable.
signals: Sees patterns in chaos others miss.
Builds contingency plans before conflict begins.
Prefers precision and control over spectacle.

results.title: Templar
results.summary: You channel conviction into protection, discipline, and righteous impact.
results.lore: Templars bind their strength to sacred vows that outlast campaigns. They stand where corruption gathers and refuse compromise where lives are on the line.
signals: Acts from principle even in uncertain terrain.
Combines protection with decisive counterattacks.
Earns trust through integrity under strain.

results.title: Oracle
results.summary: You perceive hidden currents and guide outcomes before conflict peaks.
results.lore: Oracles listen where most only react. Their warnings arrive early and often, but never lightly. In battle, foresight is their first weapon and compassion their second.
signals: Connects intuition with careful interpretation.
Notices relational and spiritual fault lines.
Prefers prevention to recovery.
results.growthQuest: Trust clear action when signs align.

results.title: Druid
results.summary: You synchronize with natural systems and fight as part of an ecosystem.
results.lore: Druids do not dominate nature; they negotiate with it. Their magic is rooted in seasons, migration, and renewal. They are fierce where balance is threatened.
signals: Interprets change as part of a larger pattern.
Balances compassion with practical survival.
Creates resilient, sustainable solutions.
results.growthQuest: Accept that some losses are part of renewal.

results.title: Shadow
results.summary: You operate from angles others ignore and win before alarms sound.
results.lore: Shadows build leverage in silence and spend it at perfect moments. They are feared less for violence than for inevitability. Every door has a seam if you know where to press.
signals: Uses discretion and misdirection with intent.
Prioritizes precision over spectacle.
Extracts value from imperfect information.
results.growthQuest: Invest in allies before crisis moments.

results.title: Trickster
results.summary: You destabilize expectations and create openings through controlled mischief.
results.lore: Tricksters are underestimated until the board is already tilted. They manipulate tempo, attention, and confidence like instruments. Their victories look accidental to everyone else.
signals: Finds creative value in uncertainty.
Uses feints and reversals to control tempo.
Turns social reads into tactical edges.
results.growthQuest: Finish plans with the same care you start them.

results.title: Artificer
results.summary: You solve danger through crafted tools, planning, and reliable execution.
results.lore: Artificers treat every conflict as a solvable mechanism. Their inventions are practical, precise, and rarely flashy. When plans hold, it is usually because they built the hidden scaffolding.
signals: Optimizes systems under real constraints.
Builds repeatable processes for volatile missions.
Converts abstract ideas into useful gear.
results.growthQuest: Trust field improvisation when plans break.

results.title: Bard
results.summary: You shape morale and momentum through connection, narrative, and timing.
results.lore: Bards carry memory across generations and make groups stronger than their parts. Their craft is not noise, but influence. They can turn despair into disciplined courage.
signals: Reads group mood and adjusts in real time.
Strengthens allies through language and presence.
Bridges conflict with creativity and tact.
results.growthQuest: Protect your own center while lifting others.

results.title: Alchemist
results.summary: You experiment at the edge, converting instability into strategic advantage.
results.lore: Alchemists respect risk but are not ruled by it. They test, refine, and deploy solutions others would never attempt. Every breakthrough comes with a measured cost.
signals: Balances curiosity with practical containment.
Turns mixed ingredients into precise outcomes.
Adapts quickly when variables shift.
results.growthQuest: Build stronger safety rails for your brilliance.

results.title: Wayfarer
results.summary: You are balanced and versatile, ready to grow in many directions.
results.lore: Wayfarers are not unfinished; they are open-ended. Their path is defined by choices still ahead. When rigid archetypes fail, adaptability becomes power.
signals: Shows broad competence across many situations.
Learns quickly from new environments.
Prefers flexible identities over fixed labels.
results.growthQuest: Choose one discipline to master first.
